page.title: 13Favourite foods and Pop
page.content: We did a survey on food. What we did was chose some food which were chips, icecream, baked beans, sausages, potatoes, fish fingers, bacon and beef burgers. We went the junior part of our school which is Greysbrooke C.P. School and asked each class which food is their favourite and out of the four classes their favourite food is icecream which has a total of 32 people the second was chips with 26 people and the third was beefburgers 15. We did a survey on pop groups. The favourite group is Wham. I do not like most pop groups because of what they wear and sometimes because of what they sing. The second was Duran Duran and the third Go West. My favourite song was the Frog Chorus by Paul McCartny which was about Rupert and some frogs. Rupert is in a dream world and lots of things happen.
